The Minions is a very funny and entertaining movie that made me laugh from beginning to end. I really liked it because the characters are hilarious, mischievous, and always getting into trouble. The minions, with their silly language and clumsy but lovable behavior, are unique and super original.

What I liked the most is that, even though they don’t speak a real language, you can understand everything they mean. Their facial expressions, gestures, and actions are so exaggerated and comical that it’s impossible not to laugh. Also, the story is simple but fun: the minions are looking for the most evil villain to serve, but everything always goes wrong, which makes the situations even funnier and crazier.
